name: Huawei P8max
description: Huawei P8max Android smartphone. Announced 2015, April. Features 3G, 6.8â€³ LTPS IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 13 MP camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth.

Display.Type: LTPS IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors

Platform.OS: Android OS, v5.0.2/5.1.1 (Lollipop), planned upgrade to v6.0 (Marshmallow)
Platform.CPU: Quad-core 2.2 GHz Cortex-A53 & quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53

Memory.Card slot: microSD, up to 64 GB (uses SIM 2 slot)

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, DLNA, WiFi Direct, hotspot

Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM

Misc.Colors: Luxurious Gold, Mystic Champagne, Titanium Grey
